data.title: Locate Test Center
data.meta_description: Are you looking for a test center near you? Use our helpful tool to locate a test center.
data.text:
Notice: Exam Cancellations Affecting the Republic of Belarus and the Russian Federation

Kryterion has cancelled online proctored and test center exams scheduled from the Republic of Belarus and the Russian Federation due to sanctions announced by the United States and other countries. If you scheduled an exam in these countries, it has been cancelled and a refund or credit issued. New exams cannot be scheduled from these countries until the sanctions are lifted. For further assistance, please contact Customer Support.

Locate a Test Center Requires Location Services On

Self-Rescheduling a Test Center (KTN) or Online Proctored (OLP) Exam
